quotes.quote: Technology alone is not enough. Itâ€™s technology married with the liberal arts, married with the humanities, that yields us the results that make our hearts sing.
Everyone has ideas -- and then they watch Netflix.
The mediator between the head and the hands must be the heart.
Find what you love and let it kill you.
Let your soul stand cool and composed before a million universes.
If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people to collect wood and don't assign them tasks and work, but rather teach them to long for the endless immensity of the sea.
